author: sunny256
msg: Break lines at 72 columns and use the same <para> style as in the original
- Don't use long lines anymore, but break at 72 columns. Use the same
<para> layout as in the original files. Linebreaks are still used after
every sentence to prevent wordwrapping messing up the diffs.
- textwidth=72, nowrap and formatoptions+=w2 in the Vim modeline.

author: maxb
msg: Fix issue 922. Ctrl-D exiting for svnshell.py.
* tools/examples/svnshell.py (SVNShell.precmd): New function, map EOF to exit.
(main): Don't ignore extra command line arguments - show usage instead.

author: sunny256
